# heading

**Instance Property**

The heading of the user’s location.

## Declaration

```swift
var heading: CLHeading? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is `nil` if the user’s location tracking mode isn’t [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKUserTrackingMode/followWithHeading].

## Determining the user’s location

- **location**: The location of the device.
- **isUpdating**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map view is updating the user’s location.
